thread.title: South Korea may remove poet's work from textbooks amid sexual abuse claims

title: South Korea may remove poet's work from textbooks amid sexual abuse claims
text:
South Korea may remove poet's work from textbooks amid sexual abuse claims   01:22 
The famed South Korean poet Ko Un, who is facing sexual misconduct allegations, could see his poems removed from school books following allegations of sexual misconduct against him. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The famed South Korean poet Ko Un, who is facing sexual misconduct allegations, could see his poems removed from school books following allegations of sexual misconduct against him.
